welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Besikduzu, Turkey! Prepare to be enchanted by the charm of our beautiful seaside city, known for its stunning beaches, rich history, and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that Besikduzu has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Trabzon Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Domestic Terminal
terminals.description: The domestic terminal at Trabzon Airport is used for domestic flights within Turkey.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Trabzon Airport is used for international flights to and from other countries.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
